text: 3|77|evarkaḷ allāhviṭattil ceyta vākkuṟutiyaiyum, taṅkaḷ cattiyaṅkaḷaiyum coṟpavilaikku viṟṟuviṭukiṟārkaḷō avarkaḷukku maṟumaiyil niccayamāka oru (naṟ)pākkiyamumillai. Mēlum, allāh (maṟumaiyil) avarkaḷuṭaṉ (virumpip) pēcavumāṭṭāṉ; (aṉpuṭaṉ) avarkaḷai iṟuti nāḷil tirumpippārkkavum māṭṭāṉ; avarkaḷaip puṉitappaṭuttavum māṭṭāṉ. Avarkaḷukkut tuṉpuṟuttum vētaṉaiyum uṇṭu
